trans-unit.source: OID
LDAP Entry Access
Compare Data Item Attributes
Lock Account
cust Internal Operation
cust Event Status Detail
cust Event Op
User login (LDAP bind) to OID server. This event is generated by ldapbind operation. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user logged in to OID.
User logout (LDAP unbind) from OID server. This event is generated by unbind operation. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user logged out of OID.

Permissions granted/denied to user for performing an LDAP operation. This event is generated by ldapadd, ldapdelete, ldapcompare, ldapmodify operations. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user performing the LDAP operation. Target attribute of this event is the DN of the user to whom authorization is granted/denied and resource attribute is the entry DN or the attribute on which operation authorization is granted/denied.

Modify sensitive information e.g. data related to user credentials, configuration, access control. This event is generated by ldapmodify operation. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user performing the LDAP operation and resource attribute is the entry DN or the LDAP attribute on which operation is performed.
Change a user's password.

Create a user or group. This event is generated by ldapadd operation. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user performing the LDAP operation. Target attribute of this event is the DN of the user or group that is created.

Delete a user or group. This event is generated by ldapdelete operation. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user performing the LDAP operation. Target attribute of this event is the DN of the user or group that is terminated.

Disable a user or group. This event is generated as a result of ldapbind or ldapcompare (e.g. through SSO) operation. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user performing the LDAP operation. Target attribute of this event is the DN of the user or group that is disabled.

Enable a user or group. This event is generated as a result of ldapbind or ldapcompare (e.g. through SSO) operation. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user performing the LDAP operation. Target attribute of this event is the DN of the user or group that is enabled.
Modify attributes of a user or group.

Compare sensitive information e.g. data related to user credentials, configuration, access control. This event is generated by ldapmodify operation. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user performing the LDAP operation and resource attribute is the entry DN or the LDAP attribute on which operation is performed.
Lock a user's account.

Internal LDAP operation. This event is generated by LDAP operation such as ldapadd, ldapdelete, ldapcompare, ldapmodify, ldapsearch. Initiator attribute for this event is the DN of the user performing the LDAP operation. Target attribute of this event is the DN of the user whose attribute is added/deleted/modified/searched and resource attribute is the user's attribute on which the operation is performed.
This attribute conveys event status detail info, e.g. error code and other details in case of failure of the associated LDAP operation.
This attribute specifies the LDAP operation name associated with this event, e.g. ldapbind, ldapadd, ldapsearch etc.
